mapper.sql: id, id_card_type AS idCardType, id_card_number AS idCardNumber, heart_rate AS heartRate, blood_oxygen AS bloodOxygen, temperature, attitude, create_date AS createDate
mapper.select: SELECT heart_rate AS heartRate, blood_oxygen AS bloodOxygen, temperature, attitude FROM buss_worker_health WHERE id_card_type = #{idCardType} and id_card_number = #{idCardNumber} and now() != 1 order by create_date desc limit 0,1

SELECT wh.blood_oxygen AS bloodOxygen, wh.temperature, (CASE `attitude` WHEN 00 THEN '否' ELSE '是' END) attitude FROM buss_worker_health AS wh WHERE wh.id_card_type = #{idCardType} AND wh.id_card_number = #{idCardNumber} ORDER BY wh.id DESC LIMIT 1
